about_the_game:
Game content:
ALPHA BOX is a 3D action platformer that's easy to learn, exciting to play, and deep enough to challenge the greatest gamers. You'll be rewarded by manipulating a block to run through the game, this fast-paced game is heartbreaking yet engaging and addictive. Enjoy extreme speed, sprint forward and master the movement. In ALPHA BOX, response and timing are key.
Get ready for impossible challenges and push your skills to the limit. The pacing of the obstacle avoidance game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

operate:
Right W or D Left
Avoid kaleidoscopic obstacles and pick up energy balls along the way
The difficulty of the game increases as the game progresses

feature:
* Difficulty progression.
* Two game modes.
* Competitive, challenging and stimulating
* There is no limit to the level of the level. Try as many times as necessary.
* Simple controls.

name: ALPHA BOX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is a rhythm parkour game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .
